#summary List software and other requirements for running this project.

= Introduction =

The following are requirements to run this project.


= Details =

  * ColdFusion MX 7.0.2 - Flash Remoting support must be enabled under Data & Services Flex
Integration - NOTE: This component utlizes the adminAPI, so you must have access to the
local ColdFusion server administrator password.
  * Currently supports MySQL 5 (possibly 4.1 but it has not been tested) and MSSQL 2000/2005
and Oracle (contributed by Beth Bowden)
